def human_readable_size(bytes):
    units = ["B", "KB", "MB", "GB", "TB"]
    index = 0
    while bytes >= 1024 and index < len(units) - 1:
        bytes /= 1024
        index += 1
    return f"{bytes:.2f}{units[index]}"
